definitions.name: Linear Regression
definitions.definition: Linear regression is when we do some awesome stuff to predict house prices

definitions.name: Computer Programming
definitions.definition: Computer Programming is this idea that computers can be told what to do. A computer alone can not do anything unless it is programmed to do something. That is the whole point of programming.

definitions.name: Variables
definitions.definition: In computer programming, variables are used to store information that can be later referenced.

definitions.name: Print Function
definitions.definition: A print function in computer programming can print a variable, text, etc to the console to return a value.

definitions.name: Functions
definitions.definition: A function is a section of a program that preforms a specific task. It can be a procedure or routine that can be called. The code can be reusable.
